text: IRAS 04509-6922 is an AGB in the Large Magellanic Cloud. IRAS 04509-6922’s minimum radius is 1,027 solar radii (1,430,286,468 km) (1,430,286,468,000 m). IRAS 04509-6922’s maximum radius is 2,249 solar radii (3,132,146,316 km) (3,132,146,316,000 m), but this is unlikely. Another estimate suggests a radius of 1,187 solar radii. It has a spectral type of M10. ==References == Category:Stars
title: IRAS 04509-6922
